title: "Gaston Glock, the man behind the gun, dies aged 94 – APA"
excerpt: "Gaston Glock, the reclusive engineer and tycoon who developed one of the world’s best-selling handguns, died on Wednesday aged 94, Austrian news agency APA said. The Austrian won loyal followings among police and military across the world with the weapons that bore his name."
